descriptionNullable:
### Context

This dataset was collected to train an SVM neural network to be shipped to help visually impaired people.
Paper available in https://doi.org/10.1016/j.micpro.2020.103086

### Content

This dataset has been divided into 4 classes, each class corresponding to a similar perspective set. The first class are crosswalks viewed from the front, the second and third correspond to the half-lane viewed from left or right, the fourth class is from non-crosswalk images, ie asphalt images, from passing cars and sidewalks. This set of images was extracted from several videos recorded with a resolution of 1280x720 at 30 FPS, in the city of Fortaleza-CE, Brazil during the period with sunlight. The images have the same resolution as the videos, 1280x720.

About file 10_FEATURES_M17_CM6b_TH199.csv

Example of the data set used on the embedded platform with the following configuration:
- Threshold images with T = 199
- Images resized by decimation with factor M = 17
- 10 GLCM features selected by complexity analysis.
- Co-occurrence matrix considering only 6 bits of grayscale images

### Acknowledgements

This dataset was created by the authors themselves with images obtained by them.


### Inspiration

What preprocessing techniques can be and what machine learning algorithm can be used to achieve good accuracy and sensitivity results with the lowest possible memory and computation time?
title: crosswalk-dataset
subtitle: Dataset for crosswalk classification
description:
### Context

This dataset was collected to train an SVM neural network to be shipped to help visually impaired people.
Paper available in https://doi.org/10.1016/j.micpro.2020.103086

### Content

This dataset has been divided into 4 classes, each class corresponding to a similar perspective set. The first class are crosswalks viewed from the front, the second and third correspond to the half-lane viewed from left or right, the fourth class is from non-crosswalk images, ie asphalt images, from passing cars and sidewalks. This set of images was extracted from several videos recorded with a resolution of 1280x720 at 30 FPS, in the city of Fortaleza-CE, Brazil during the period with sunlight. The images have the same resolution as the videos, 1280x720.

About file 10_FEATURES_M17_CM6b_TH199.csv

Example of the data set used on the embedded platform with the following configuration:
- Threshold images with T = 199
- Images resized by decimation with factor M = 17
- 10 GLCM features selected by complexity analysis.
- Co-occurrence matrix considering only 6 bits of grayscale images

### Acknowledgements

This dataset was created by the authors themselves with images obtained by them.


### Inspiration
